EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_Pivotal/Redmonk Open Source Playbook_Q116.Reminder V2
EmailTemplate.subject: Join our session now - Your Open Source Playbook for 2016
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We want to make sure you are able to join this morning's session, as you may have been provided an incorrect link to join: Your Open Source Playbook for 2016. Please refresh your browser and login with the link below:
Date: January 13, 2016 Time: 9:00 AM PST / 5:00 PM GMT
Join the Session Now >> http://event.on24.com/wcc/r/1106386/7D539984DC206D9B054ABD333A41288E
We apologize for the inconvenience! The Pivotal Team
